name: 1 Million Meters Till Down
description:
Controls:

Use A and D to switch between options in the main menu. Use Space or Enter buttons to chose an option. 

In the game you can control a character by using A and D buttons. A - rotate clockwise, D - anti-clockwise. You also can jump by using Space button.

Credits:

Music was taken from https: //mixkit.co/free-stock-music/ 

Plane model: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/crushed-plane-6d36c89d531d47bda5f415ce7267d214 

Character: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/skier-low-poly-character-13ae2a85b3af43ab8b1e984...

Packages used:

Cinemachine, Postprocessing, TextMesh Pro
